mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content (price, title, icon, abstract, text) VALUES (#{price},#{title},#{icon},#{summary},#{detail})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.price,c.title, c.icon, c.abstract AS summary , c.text AS detail FROM content c
SELECT c.id, c.price,c.title, c.icon, c.abstract AS summary , c.text AS detail FROM content c WHERE c.id = #{id}
